author: ferencek
body:
Bugfix addresses the problem  which occurs when the new extended functionality (introduced in #7582) is used with `lazyParser` set to `False`. An example of the exception message is given below

```
----- Begin Fatal Exception 24-Feb-2015 23:03:33 CST-----------------------
An exception of category 'Configuration' occurred while
   [0] Constructing the EventProcessor
   [1] Constructing module: class=RecoJetDeltaRValueMapProducer label='Pruned'
Exception Message:
Expression parser error:no method or data member named "dummy" found for type "reco::Jet" (char 0)
----- End Fatal Exception -------------------------------------------------
```
title: Bugfix for JetDeltaRValueMapProducer
